entry.title: Bitcoin and ISO
entry.summary: In a forum post on bitcointalk.org, Jeff Garzik, an exMULTI, Inc. employee, highlighted the importance of standardization in the world of Bitcoin. Although he didn't elaborate on what aspects of Bitcoin need to be standardized, his message suggests that any small effort towards standardization can be beneficial. Garzik's post is worth tracking for those interested in the development and evolution of Bitcoin.
